When Xueyi reduces enemy Toughness with attacks, Karma will be stacked. The more Toughness is reduced, the more stacks of Karma are added, up to {{1}} stacks.
When Xueyi's teammates reduce enemy Toughness with attacks, Xueyi gains {{3}} stack(s) of Karma.

This Follow-up ATK will not add Karma stacks.
